studioLead.name: Al Iannucci
studioLead.title: Studio Manager / Digital Technician / Prop Builder
studioLead.bio: With over 12 years of experience in commercial photography production, I've had the privilege of working with some of the world's most recognized brands. My role spans digital technical direction, prop building, and overall studio management—ensuring every shoot runs seamlessly from concept to final delivery. I'd love to introduce you to my incredible team.

vendors.name: Corey Martineau
vendors.bio: Brief bio about their experience, specialties, and notable work...

vendors.name: Michelle Carpenter
vendors.bio: Michelle Carpenter is a commercial photographer specializing in product imagery for luxury, consumer, and technology brands. Her work is defined by lighting precision, visual clarity, and a disciplined creative approach—crafted for products that demand accuracy and elevated presentation across print, digital, and retail platforms. Since 2012, Michelle has been an integral part of Hasbro Global Photo Studios, creating visual marketing imagery across multiple brands. Her experience in high-volume studio environments has shaped a production-savvy mindset and deep understanding of how imagery must function at scale while honoring each brand's unique visual language. With a strong foundation in controlled studio lighting and color management, Michelle creates imagery that highlights form, texture, and finish with intention. Her lighting style is clean and sculptural, designed to enhance premium surfaces and fine details while maintaining color accuracy—essential for products positioned at the top of their category. Known for her collaborative presence on set, Michelle works seamlessly with creative directors, designers, and production teams to translate brand vision into imagery that performs. Her process is efficient, thoughtful, and built for environments where expectations are high.

vendors.name: Serena Gaitskell
vendors.bio: British born fashion stylist Serena Gaitskell launched her career in fashion covering the runway shows in Paris, Milan, London and New York and wrote and styled her way across London's media including The Independent, Drapers and The Sunday Express as Fashion Editor.Now based in Rhode Island, with a six year stint in San Francisco writing for Women's Wear Daily and the San Francisco Design Center, Serena styles commercially for television, web and print as well as for the movie industry. When not dressing extras for Woody Allen or Wes Anderson or turning regular pint-sized people into cool, streetwise urchins or mini fashionistas, Serena enjoys the New England coastline with her husband Rick and three children Portia, Luc and Minty.

categories.title: Hair & Makeup
categories.description: Professional hair styling and makeup artistry

vendors.name: Noel McKinnon
vendors.bio: Noel McKinnon is the founder and award winning makeup/hair artist leading Makeup 2 die 4. Known as “the wedding whisperer” per her Best of Boston award. Noel is not just known for styling flawless brides but also has been acknowledged for her impeccable work for some of the most well recognizable people, publications and productions in the world. Alex Baldwin, Hilary Clinton, Tim Gun, People Magazine, ELLE, Modern Luxury Wedding, HBO, Showtime, and Walburger’s to name a few. She was also nominated top five finalist twice in the North American Hairstyling Awards for makeup.
